column4:
·Driving & Power input：Common cathode PWM driving & VLEDR / VLEDGB power input
·Mirage Driving Engine：Solving 8 fine pitch visual issue: Ghosting effect, Open caterpillar effect, Cross effect, Low gray color shift, First dimming line, High contrast couple, Cross plate couple, Cross plate gradient CCT
·Channel / Scan：48ch / 20 scan
·Max Scan Number：Single chip 20 scan
·Output current：Ｒ/Ｇ：0.1～15mA & B ：0.1～7.5mA
·Bit & Refresh Rate：18bit @ 3840Hz /20scan
·Interface：3 Wire SPI & Max 36 chips per channel
·Global Calibration：2 calibration parameter @ high & low gray level
·Min. Calibration Pulse Width：0.8nS
·Chip power consumption @Dark：8.5uW / Pixel @ 16x20 dots
·Chip power consumption @White：81uW / Pixel @ 10mA pixel current
·Package：QFN88 - 10 x 10 - 0.45
·LED Pitch Application：XR application pitch
